title: Assistant Athletic Trainer - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Assistant Athletic Trainer Posted/Updated: 10-23-2015 Brief Job Description: Responsible for developing and coordinating, a program to prevent, evaluate, treat, and rehabilitate athletic related injuries and illnesses. Responsible for medical coverage of a 14-sport program...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
